column1: * 1915 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes You and Me / and the Cottage of Lost Play.
* 1936 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes the manuscript "Parma Eldalamberon 21".
* 1956 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Deirdre Levinson (28 April 1956).
* 1965 - Actor Steven Jay Blum is born.
* 1967 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to John Leyerle.
* 1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Mrs Robertson.
* 1979 - One Ring to Bind Them All: Tolkiens Mythology is published.
* 2008 - Tolkien - min vän Ronald och hans världar is published.
* 2009 - The 1997 documentary J.R.R. Tolkien (1997 documentary) is released on DVD in the USA.
** Bilbo Baggins leaves Bag End and starts his journey to the Lonely Mountain with Gandalf and the Thorin and Company.Category:Datesfi:28. huhtikuuta
